definitions.text: a military operation (often involving new supplies of men and materiel) to strengthen a military force or aid in the performance of its mission
information that makes more forcible or convincing
examples: his gestures provided eloquent reinforcement for his complaints

definitions.text: (psychology) a stimulus that strengthens or weakens the behavior that produced it
a device designed to provide additional strength
examples: the cardboard backing was just a strengthener
he used gummed reinforcements to hold the page in his notebook

definitions.text: an act performed to strengthen approved behavior
